meanings.definition: The state or quality of being possessive.
meanings.sent1: Her possessivenesses over her toys made it hard for her to share with her friends.
meanings.sent2: His possessivenesses of his favorite bookshelf was evident by the way he guarded it.
meanings.sent3: The possessivenesses of the cat over its favorite toy mouse was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The possessivenesses of the old tree over the sunlight created a beautiful pattern on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The possessivenesses of the child over the shiny rock was like a dragon guarding its treasure.

meanings.definition: The tendency to want to own or control someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The possessivenesses of the villain over the kingdom led to chaos and rebellion.
meanings.sent2: Her possessivenesses over her boyfriend drove him away with her constant jealousy.
meanings.sent3: The possessivenesses of the dog over its favorite bone was comical as it tried to hide it in various places.
meanings.sent4: The possessivenesses of the storm over the sky darkened the day with heavy clouds.
meanings.sent5: The possessivenesses of the collector over rare stamps was like a dragon hoarding gold coins.
